entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:43 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
